japanese: わたしって、格闘技の才能無いのかな……。/ひなたさんと同じ通信教育を習ってるのに、/ゼンゼン違うもの。
english: I guess I lack martial arts talent... /Learning the same correspondence course /as Hinata-san, but so different.

japanese: アイツらも/必死に生きてるんだと思うと、/見過ごせないのさ。
english: Thinking they're trying to live too, /I can't ignore them.

japanese: わがままだぞ/ももにはできないだろうなぁ/自信を持てよ
english: You're selfish/ Momo can't do it/ Have confidence

japanese: わがままだよ/ももちゃんにはできないだろうなぁ/自信を持って
english: You're selfish/ Momo-chan can't do it/ Have confidence

japanese: アキラのツープラトン技/!c03『協奏連撃蹴』!c07を覚えた！
english: Learned Akira's Two-Platoon technique /!c03'Concerto Combo Kick'!c07!

japanese: ん〜仕方ないな。/俺も手伝うよ。
english: Hmm... can't be helped. /I'll help too.

japanese: アキラがどうかしたの？
english: Something happen to Akira?

japanese: ん……確か、/演劇部とか文科系のクラブが/発表をやるって聞いたけど？
english: Hmm... I think /the drama club and arts clubs /are doing presentations?

japanese: ん……？/俺の顔に、何かついてます？
english: Hmm...? /Something on my face?

japanese: ん……？/私の顔に、何かついてます？
english: Hmm...? /Something on my face?

japanese: アキラ、お化け屋敷があるよ。/入ってみる？
english: Akira, there's a haunted house. /Wanna go in?

japanese: アキラ、荷物運びか？/俺も手伝うよ。
english: Akira, carrying luggage? /I'll help too.

japanese: アキラがどうかしたのか？
english: Something happen to Akira?

japanese: わかったわかった！/行けばいいんだろ？
english: Got it got it! /I just need to go, right?

japanese: わかるかね？/昨日一晩かけて磨いたんだよ、/今日のために。
english: See? /I polished it all night /for today.

japanese: わっ！/誰かと思えば、ザキじゃない！
english: Ah! /Who I thought it was, it's Zaki!

japanese: ん？/屋上に、誰かいるみたいだぞ……。
english: Huh? /Looks like someone's on the roof...

japanese: ん？/屋上に、誰かいるみたいねぇ……。
english: Huh? /Looks like someone's on the roof...

japanese: アイツは相撲部の方で、/何かやるっていってたなァ。
english: That guy said he's doing something /with the sumo club.

japanese: アキラの友達で、/マスクをしている女生徒の名前は/何といったかな？
english: What was the name of /Akira's friend with the mask?

japanese: ん〜仕方ないわね。/私も手伝うわよ。
english: Hmm... can't be helped. /I'll help too.

japanese: アキラ、お化け屋敷があるぞ。/入ってみるか？
english: Akira, there's a haunted house. /Wanna go in?

japanese: アメリカに二人で帰って、/一年近くになるだろ？/な、何かあったんじゃないのか？
english: You two went back to America /almost a year ago, right? /D-did something happen?

japanese: アメリカに二人で帰って、/一年近くになるのよ？/ね、何かあったんじゃないの？
english: You two went back to America /almost a year ago, right? /Did something happen?

japanese: わっ、雷蔵学園長！
english: Ah, Raizo Principal!

japanese: ん？　英雄先生、/なんか甘い香りがしますね。
english: Huh? Shimazu-sensei, /there's a sweet smell.

japanese: ア、アキラに手出す野郎がいたら、/ブッ飛ばしてやろうと見張ってただけだぜ！/マ、マジだぜ！　マジ！
english: I-if anyone messed with Akira, /I was just watching to beat them up! /I-I'm serious! Serious!

japanese: わしからのプレゼントだ！/この!c04カード!c07をあげよう！/頑張りたまえ！
english: A present from me! /I'll give you this !c04Card!c07! /Do your best!

japanese: ア、アンタ、ゆりかの手先なんだろ？/だったら、容赦しないよ！
english: Y-you're Yurika's lackey, right? /Then I won't show mercy!
